context: Instacart (Maplebear Inc.) is a grocery delivery and technology platform focused on grocery delivery, pickup, and retail technology. Grocery technology platform. Competing with DoorDash, Amazon.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery through Prime, Whole Foods, and Amazon Fresh

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Dominant grocery retailer with Spark delivery network

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Grocery and retail delivery expanding beyond restaurants

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery integrated with food delivery platform

competitors.name: Kroger
competitors.notes: Automated fulfillment and own delivery capabilities

competitors.name: Target/Shipt
competitors.notes: Same-day delivery for groceries and retail

competitors.name: Gopuff
competitors.notes: Quick commerce platform for convenience items
